question:
Which of the following places were added by king Kanishka to the Kushana Empire?
1) Varanasi
2) Kaushambi
3) Shravasti
4) Sanchi
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: King Kanishka was the son of Kadphises II. He expanded the Kushana empire from Central Asia to Afghanistan and north-western India, to further east into the Ganga valley and southwards into the Malwa region. He included Varanasi, Kaushambi, Shravasti, and Sanchi into the empire.
